citation.abstract: The purpose was to investigate the possible correlation or predictive relationship between breastfeeding and Postpartum Depression (PPD).
citation.journal: International Journal of Psychiatry in Medicine
citation.title: The relationship between postpartum depression and breastfeeding.

news.title: The Womanly Art of Breastfeeding

author.name: Dr. Sarah Allen
